headline.main: Move to Curb the Widespread Use of 'Pep Pills'

docs.abstract: article on FDA moving to restrict allowable med claims for amphetamines to 3 uses: treatment of narcolepsy, hyperactivity in brain-damaged children and short-term use as aid to obesity
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON A few years ago, a truck collided with a bus on a highway. Nine people were killed and many were injured. Investigators found that the truck driver had been heavily dosed with amphetamine and that he had not slept for 49 hours; possibly, he had simply blacked out when the drug's effect wore off.
